surfit variables for OpenGL drawing
[surfit variables]


Variables

SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::bg_color_red
 amount of red (0..255) in background color
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::bg_color_green
 amount of green (0..255) in background color
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::bg_color_blue
 amount of blue (0..255) in background color
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::bg_color_alpha
 amount of alpha (0..255) in background color

 amount of marks on X-axis
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::grid_amount_y
 amount of marks on Z-axis

 size of points to draw
SURFIT_EXPORT float surfit::x_shift
 x shift for coordinate axes moving
SURFIT_EXPORT float surfit::y_shift
 y shift for coordinate axes moving
SURFIT_EXPORT float surfit::scale
 scale factor
SURFIT_EXPORT float surfit::z_scale
 additional scale factor for Z-axis
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::axis_labels
 flag to draw axis labels
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::light
 flag to enable/disable lighting
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::smooth
 enables/disables smooth functions drawing
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::isoline
 enables/disables isolines drawing
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::draw_wtask
 flag for wtasks drawing

 flag for funcs drawing

 flag for wfuncs drawing

 flag for trends drawing

 flag for pisos drawing

 flag for pcntrs drawing

 flag for pareas drawing
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::draw_grid
 flag for grid drawing
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::draw_defarea
 flag for defarea drawing
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::use_projections
 flag for projecting objects (curv, flt and others) to functions (func)
SURFIT_EXPORT int surfit::fix_axes
 flag for minx, maxx, miny, maxy, minz, maxz recalculating If fix_axes set to 1, then no recalculation will be done.
